newsitem.title: USA: A. Robert Pisano named vice chairman of MGM.
newsitem.headline: A. Robert Pisano named vice chairman of MGM.

text.p: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Inc said Thursday that A. Robert Pisano was promoted to the newly-created position of vice chairman, where he will supervise the company's business operations.

The units reporting to Pisano will include MGM Telecommunications, MGM Home Entertainment, MGM Music, MGM Interactive and MGM Consumer Products. He will also be responsible for corporate strategy and communications, business development and legal and business affairs.
Pisano joined MGM in 1993 as executive vice president.
MGM is jointly owned by the Australian media conglomerate Seven Network Ltd and Tracinda Corp, the investment wing of investor Kirk Kerkorian.
